Articles.Content:
It may be a stupid question, but how to switch ships? I saw people switching ships with 1 key...

Edited October 17, 2012 by sal_vager

You can use the '[' and ']' keys to switch between close by vessels.

(Off-topic, but where did you get the banner in your signature, I've been trying to find it for a while now.)
[ and ] keys. But that only works within a certain distance. Beyond that, you'll have to visit the tracking center and choose the craft there.
